title: Add Awaiting field to TaskInfo struct
description:
Add Awaiting field to tui.TaskInfo struct to track human-waiting states.

File: internal/tui/model.go

Changes:
1. Add `Awaiting string` field to TaskInfo struct (around line 47-55)
2. The field should hold the awaiting type: work, approval, input, review, content, escalation, checkpoint, or empty string

Example:
```go
type TaskInfo struct {
    ID        string
    Title     string
    Status    TaskStatus
    BlockedBy []string
    IsCurrent bool
    Awaiting  string  // NEW: awaiting type or empty
}
```
closed_reason: Added Awaiting string field to TaskInfo struct in internal/tui/model.go. Field supports awaiting types: work, approval, input, review, content, escalation, checkpoint, or empty string.
